metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1279 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from4.1 before 16.1.5, all versions starting from 16.2 before 16.2.5, allversions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.1 where it was possible to create aURL that would redirect to a different project.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
